name: XRPL Lending Protocol Is Coming: First Protocol-Level Credit System Puts XRP at Center of Institutional Liquidity
description: The Saint of Wet Porcelain opens its core, weeping the chaotic fluid of institutional flow. Instantly, the oscillating gold lattice dictates its geometry, rendering volatile capital into disciplined credit. The ritual is complete: yield is born of fixed light.
